oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weed management in organic cropping systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rasmussen, Ilse A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this review is to provide an overview of weed control methods available for organic farming systems based on research mainly from Europe and North America, but measures mentioned here are not necessarily allowed in organic farming. Biological control of weeds is not considered in this review.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Rasmussen, Ilse A. (2004) Weed management in organic cropping systems. In: Goodman, Robert M. (Ed.) Encyclopedia of Plant and Crop Science. Marcel Dekker Inc., pp. 1-4.
